how-it-works-first-step: Take a picture of the document
we-use-blockchain: We use blockchain to authenticate documents
you-have-to-add-at-least-one: You have to add at least one document
alert-10-files: You can add only 10 files per report!
alert-success: Your report is ready! The download will start automatically.
add-your-files: Add your files and get a case report sample! You can add up to 10 images at a time.
if-you-want-to-try: If you want to try and do not have any image to submit, feel free to download a document image sample
